page.title: 01THE GHOST OF N. CHERITON
page.content: THE GHOST OF NORTHCHERITON IS THAT OF A SOLDIER WHO FOUGHT AT THE BATTLE OF SEDGEMOOR. THE STORY GOES THAT SOME OF THE SOLDIERS FLED AT THE BATTLE TO AVOID EXECUTION.ONE OF THEM FOUND HIMSEIF IN NORTH CHERITON,HE WAS A FOLLOWER OF THE DUKE OF MONMOUTH.DURING THE BATTLE IN 1688.THE SOLDIER WAS WALKING THROUGH THE VILLAGE,IT WAS DOWN WHERE THE CEMETERY STANDS TODAY THAT THE SOLDIER WAS KILLED BUT THE GRAVEYARD WAS NOT THERE THEN.AND IT IS SAID THAT HIS GHOST NOW WALKS UP THE MAIN ROAD BETWEEN THE GRAVEYARD AND THE CHURCH.IT IS BECAUSE HE WAS A RELIGOUS MAN THAT HIS BODY DOES NOT KNOW WHERE TO REST,UNTIL HE GETS INTO THE CHURCH.IT IS SAID TO HAPPEN BETWEEN MIDNIGT AND DAWN.
